title: How are businesses collecting data (and what are they doing with it)? - Quora

response.answer_text: In general, businesses collect data in the following ways: The data is submitted by the consumer (submitting a contact form, subscribing to an email newsletter list, signing up for an account or making a purchase);Tracking technologies such as cookies and analytics services;Purchasing data from resellers;Receiving data from partners or cross-channel sales;Consumers submitting their data in response to advertisements;Consumers submitting their data from lead magnets.Businesses use this data to: Respond to consumer inquiries;Gain insights as to how consumers are using their products or their website or application;Marketing and advertising;Create new products;Resell the data to others.
